+            ListDocumentClassifiersRequest listDocumentClassifiersRequest) {
+        if (listDocumentClassifiersRequest == null) {
+            throw new AmazonClientException(
+                    "Invalid argument passed to marshall(ListDocumentClassifiersRequest)");
+        }
+
+        Request<ListDocumentClassifiersRequest> request = new DefaultRequest<ListDocumentClassifiersRequest>(
+                listDocumentClassifiersRequest, "AmazonComprehend");
+        String target = "Comprehend_20171127.ListDocumentClassifiers";
+        request.addHeader("X-Amz-Target", target);
+        request.setHttpMethod(HttpMethodName.POST);
+
+        String uriResourcePath = "/";
+        request.setResourcePath(uriResourcePath);
+        try {
+            StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter();
+            AwsJsonWriter jsonWriter = JsonUtils.getJsonWriter(stringWriter);
+            jsonWriter.beginObject();
+
+            if (listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getFilter() != null) {
+                DocumentClassifierFilter filter = listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getFilter();
+                jsonWriter.name("Filter");
+                DocumentClassifierFilterJsonMarshaller.getInstance().marshall(filter, jsonWriter);
+            }
+            if (listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getNextToken() != null) {
+                String nextToken = listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getNextToken();
+                jsonWriter.name("NextToken");
+                jsonWriter.value(nextToken);
+            }
+            if (listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getMaxResults() != null) {
+                Integer maxResults = listDocumentClassifiersRequest.getMaxResults();
+                jsonWriter.name("MaxResults");
+                jsonWriter.value(maxResults);
+            }
+
+            jsonWriter.endObject();
+            jsonWriter.close();
+            String snippet = stringWriter.toString();
+            byte[] content = snippet.getBytes(UTF8);
+            request.setContent(new StringInputStream(snippet));
+            request.addHeader("Content-Length", Integer.toString(content.length));
+        } catch (Throwable t) {
+            throw new AmazonClientException(
+                    "Unable to marshall request to JSON: " + t.getMessage(), t);
+        }
+        if (!request.getHeaders().containsKey("Content-Type")) {
+            request.addHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-amz-json-1.1");
+        }

+        return request;

+package com.amazonaws.services.comprehend.model.transform;
+
+import static com.amazonaws.util.StringUtils.UTF8;
+import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
+import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
+import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
+import java.io.StringWriter;
+import java.io.Writer;
+
+import com.amazonaws.AmazonClientException;
+import com.amazonaws.Request;
+import com.amazonaws.DefaultRequest;
+import com.amazonaws.http.HttpMethodName;
+import com.amazonaws.services.comprehend.model.*;
+import com.amazonaws.transform.Marshaller;
+import com.amazonaws.util.BinaryUtils;
+import com.amazonaws.util.StringUtils;
+import com.amazonaws.util.StringInputStream;
+import com.amazonaws.util.json.AwsJsonWriter;
+import com.amazonaws.util.json.JsonUtils;
+
+/**
+ * JSON request marshaller for StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+ */
+public class StartDocumentClassificationJobRequestMarshaller
+        implements
+        Marshaller<Request<StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest>, StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest> {
+
+    public Request<StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest> marshall(
+            StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest startDocumentClassificationJobRequest) {
+        if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest == null) {
+            throw new AmazonClientException(
+                    "Invalid argument passed to marshall(StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest)");
+        }
+
+        Request<StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest> request = new DefaultRequest<StartDocumentClassificationJobRequest>(
+                startDocumentClassificationJobRequest, "AmazonComprehend");
+        String target = "Comprehend_20171127.StartDocumentClassificationJob";
+        request.addHeader("X-Amz-Target", target);
+        request.setHttpMethod(HttpMethodName.POST);
+
+        String uriResourcePath = "/";
+        request.setResourcePath(uriResourcePath);
+        try {
+            StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter();
+            AwsJsonWriter jsonWriter = JsonUtils.getJsonWriter(stringWriter);
+            jsonWriter.beginObject();
+
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getJobName() != null) {
+                String jobName = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getJobName();
+                jsonWriter.name("JobName");
+                jsonWriter.value(jobName);
+            }
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getDocumentClassifierArn() != null) {
+                String documentClassifierArn = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+                        .getDocumentClassifierArn();
+                jsonWriter.name("DocumentClassifierArn");
+                jsonWriter.value(documentClassifierArn);
+            }
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getInputDataConfig() != null) {
+                InputDataConfig inputDataConfig = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+                        .getInputDataConfig();
+                jsonWriter.name("InputDataConfig");
+                InputDataConfigJsonMarshaller.getInstance().marshall(inputDataConfig, jsonWriter);
+            }
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getOutputDataConfig() != null) {
+                OutputDataConfig outputDataConfig = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+                        .getOutputDataConfig();
+                jsonWriter.name("OutputDataConfig");
+                OutputDataConfigJsonMarshaller.getInstance().marshall(outputDataConfig, jsonWriter);
+            }
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getDataAccessRoleArn() != null) {
+                String dataAccessRoleArn = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+                        .getDataAccessRoleArn();
+                jsonWriter.name("DataAccessRoleArn");
+                jsonWriter.value(dataAccessRoleArn);
+            }
+            if (startDocumentClassificationJobRequest.getClientRequestToken() != null) {
+                String clientRequestToken = startDocumentClassificationJobRequest
+                        .getClientRequestToken();
+                jsonWriter.name("ClientRequestToken");
+                jsonWriter.value(clientRequestToken);
+            }
+
+            jsonWriter.endObject();
+            jsonWriter.close();
+            String snippet = stringWriter.toString();
+            byte[] content = snippet.getBytes(UTF8);
+            request.setContent(new StringInputStream(snippet));
+            request.addHeader("Content-Length", Integer.toString(content.length));
+        } catch (Throwable t) {
+            throw new AmazonClientException(
+                    "Unable to marshall request to JSON: " + t.getMessage(), t);
+        }
+        if (!request.getHeaders().containsKey("Content-Type")) {
+            request.addHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-amz-json-1.1");
+        }
+
+        return request;
+    }
+}

+package com.amazonaws.services.comprehend.model.transform;
+
+import com.amazonaws.services.comprehend.model.*;
+import com.amazonaws.transform.SimpleTypeJsonUnmarshallers.*;
+import com.amazonaws.transform.*;
+import com.amazonaws.util.json.AwsJsonReader;
+
+/**
+ * JSON unmarshaller for response StartDocumentClassificationJobResult
+ */
+public class StartDocumentClassificationJobResultJsonUnmarshaller implements
+        Unmarshaller<StartDocumentClassificationJobResult, JsonUnmarshallerContext> {
+
+    public StartDocumentClassificationJobResult unmarshall(JsonUnmarshallerContext context)
+            throws Exception {
+        StartDocumentClassificationJobResult startDocumentClassificationJobResult = new StartDocumentClassificationJobResult();
+
+        AwsJsonReader reader = context.getReader();
+        reader.beginObject();
+        while (reader.hasNext()) {
+            String name = reader.nextName();
+            if (name.equals("JobId")) {
+                startDocumentClassificationJobResult.setJobId(StringJsonUnmarshaller.getInstance()
+                        .unmarshall(context));
+            } else if (name.equals("JobStatus")) {
+                startDocumentClassificationJobResult.setJobStatus(StringJsonUnmarshaller
+                        .getInstance()
+                        .unmarshall(context));
+            } else {
+                reader.skipValue();
+            }
+        }
+        reader.endObject();
+
+        return startDocumentClassificationJobResult;
+    }
+
+    private static StartDocumentClassificationJobResultJsonUnmarshaller instance;
+
+    public static StartDocumentClassificationJobResultJsonUnmarshaller getInstance() {
+        if (instance == null)
+            instance = new StartDocumentClassificationJobResultJsonUnmarshaller();
+        return instance;
+    }

+     * array using the same ordering, from the top to the bottom. The response

-    /* package */ int getNotificationRequestId(final String campaignId, final String activityId) {
-        return (campaignId + ":" + activityId).hashCode();
+    /**
+     * @return a unique notification request ID that is given to the
+     *         NotificationManager for the notification. A random identifier
+     *         is generated in order to uniquely identify the notification
+     *         within the application.
+     */
+    int getNotificationRequestId(final String campaignId,
+                                 final String activityId) {
+        // Adding a random unique identifier for direct sends. For a campaign,
+        // use the campaingId and the activityId in order to prevent displaying
+        // duplicate notifications from a campaign activity.
+        if (DIRECT_CAMPAIGN_SEND.equals(campaignId) && activityId == null) {
+            return random.nextInt();
+        } else {
+            return (campaignId + ":" + activityId).hashCode();
+        }
     }
